div.p: Identifies the style of unique identifier used to identify a namepace
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/namespace-identifier-type

tr.td: A universally unique identifier of the form a5afddf4-e880-459b-876e-e4591b0acc11.
A uniform resource identifier (ideally a URL - uniform resource locator). E.g. http://unitsofmeasure.org.
Some other type of unique identifier. E.g HL7-assigned reserved string such as LN for LOINC.

description.value: Identifies the style of unique identifier used to identify a namepace

definition.value: A universally unique identifier of the form a5afddf4-e880-459b-876e-e4591b0acc11.
A uniform resource identifier (ideally a URL - uniform resource locator). E.g. http://unitsofmeasure.org.
Some other type of unique identifier. E.g HL7-assigned reserved string such as LN for LOINC.
